content:
Palm tre 
 Simon Ipo 
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Let me tel you 
 
 about the 
 
 palm tre. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 This tre lives 
 
 when everything 
 
 else is dry. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The palm tre 
 
 shade is col. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 We eat fruit 
 
 from the 
 
 palm tre. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 We use palm 
 
 leaves 
 
 to thatch 
 
 our houses. 
 
 
 
 We use palm 
 
 branches 
 
 to fence 
 
 
 our homesteads. 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 We make broms 
 
 and mats 
 
 from palm leaves. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 We use palm tre 
 
 seds for fuel. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Do you se why 
 
 the palm tre 
 
 is important? 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 8
